DOC.brief_summary: To correlate serum proteomics patterns with PET/CT findings to improve cancer diagnosis, staging, prognosis, and therapy monitoring.
DOC.brief_title: Correlation of PET-CT Studies With Serum Protein Analysis
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients must have a PET/CT study performed at the time of blood collection. 2. Patients must understand and voluntarily sign an Informed Consent form after the contents have been fully explained to them. 1. Patients who are not eligible for a PET/CT study.
